step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice circular motion. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together and down as you roll back.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Second set is looking good. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement.
Excellent control in the circular motion. Ensure you're moving both shoulders together.
Fantastic finish to the second set! You're doing great with shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Take a deep breath in as you pull back to help with lymphatic flow and breathing. Keep up the excellent work!
